# Mulitple (Predictor) Regression Models

We expand on the bivariate regression model to include multiple predictors.  This model is more complex but provides a more realistic view of the world.  We will discuss the following:

## Learning Objectives

1. Understand the purpose of the model.
2. Learn how to interpret the output of a multiple regression model.
3. Understand how to use the model to make predictions.
4. Learn how to evaluate the model's performance.
